gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 132, Pacers 129
gameRecap.excerpt: After tying the game 117-117 with 0.3 left in the fourth quarter, DeMar DeRozan led the Bulls with 46 total points (18 between Q4 and OT), along with nine rebounds, and three assists as the Bulls defeated the Pacers, 132-129 in OT. Alex Caruso (23 points, 5-6 3PT, seven rebounds, seven assists) and Ayo Dosunmu (20 points, four rebounds, three assists) totaled 43 points for Chicago. Myles Turner led Indiana with 27 points and seven rebounds as Tyrese Haliburton totaled 17 points and 14 assists for Indiana in the loss. Chicago improves to 32-34 as the Pacers move to 37-30.
